name: Volume Shadow Copy Mount
description: Detects volume shadow copy mount via windows event log
false_positives: Legitimate use of volume shadow copy mounts (backups maybe).
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Ntfs AND event.code:98 AND winlog.event_data.DeviceName:*HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy*)`
